name: Carbon Labs
description: Carbon Labs is a blockchain development company focusing on tools that give control back to users over their data and identities. We are developing a number of key projects including: 1. Graphite: Unique and fair governance platform. 2. UTO Model: Unlimited token model that is an alternative to the ICO model. The UTO model fixes price based on real value and allows anyone to invest into the project without feat of losing their investment. 3. Carbon Proofs: A proof of existence system built on top of the Zilliqa blockchain and IPFS, allowing users to prove that they had access to and control of a digital asset at a particular point in time. 4. Avatar: Puts users back in control of their data and online identities.
